Name: ImageButton
Description: Button that displays an image with click events.

Properties.Name: CornerRadius
Properties.Description: Corner radius applied to the button.

Properties.Name: Aspect
Properties.Description: How the image is scaled within its bounds.

Properties.Name: IsOpaque
Properties.Description: Whether the image is fully opaque.

Properties.Name: Padding
Properties.Description: Inner padding of the button content.

Events.Name: Clicked
Events.Description: Raised when the button is clicked.

Events.Name: Pressed
Events.Description: Raised when the button is pressed.

Events.Name: Released
Events.Description: Raised when the button is released.

Constructors.Description: Creates an ImageButton and sets its image source from a file/resource path.
Creates an ImageButton and sets its image source from a URI.
